author: daggers2017
title: Perfect location
text:
The hotel staff were friendly and very helpful. Top marks for Cristele and her team! The rooms were on the small side but not cramped and very comfortable. We had a great view of the Madeleine. Our daughter's room next to ours, was smaller but also comfy. Downstairs there is a breakfast area, a lounge area, free newspapers and reasonably priced coffee. And the location, for walking to all the sights, could not have been better. Would I return? Tomorrow!
Room Tip: Ask fro a room facing the Madeleine See more room tips
